post:
Hello LowEndTalk Community,

Its Matt here from UplinkVPS.com with our first offer to your community. We are a brand new company that offers reliable Virtual Servers & Dedicated solutions at budget prices. We also have a 15 day money back guarantee, so if your not satisfied we will refund you the entire purchase amount. 

We currently colocate our equipment at Continuum Data Centers in Chicago and also Colo@ for Atlanta and Los Angeles. 

Currently we offer SSD FlashCache OpenVZ virtual servers and KVM Virtual servers.

Our offer for your community:

35% Recurring Discount of any OpenVZ or KVM Plans (cPanel addon not included)

**Coupon Code:** LEBEXCLUSIVE 


**Test IPs:**

    * Chicago, IL: 216.231.136.1
    * Atlanta, GA: 198.8.81.1
    * Los Angeles, CA: 199.229.255.1


[View OpenVZ Plans](uplinkvps.com/ssd-vps-hosting/)
[View KVM Plans](uplinkvps.com/budget-kvm-vps-hosting/)


* **LVS-1 (OpenVZ)**
* 2 Cores (2.5Ghz)
* 1TB Monthly Traffic
* 35 GB RAID Storage
* 756MB Guaranteed Ram (1GB Burst)
* 756MB vSwap
* 1Gbps Port Speed
* 1 IPv4 + 5 IPv6 (Chicago Only for IPv6 currently)
* Retail Price: $5.99USDmth
* After Coupon: $3.89USDmth [Order Now](https://secure.uplinkvps.com/cart.php?a=add&pid=1)

* **KVM-1 (KVM)**
* 1 Core (2.5Ghz)
* 1TB Monthly Traffic
* 20GB Raid Storage
* 256MB Guaranteed Ram
* 256MB vSwap
* 1Gbps Port Speed
* 1 IPv4 + 5 IPv6 (Chicago Only for IPv6 currently)
* Retail Price: $4.99/mo
* After Coupon: $3.24USD/mo
   [Order Now](https://secure.uplinkvps.com/cart.php?a=add&pid=9)


If you have any questions, concerns, or comments please let us know. We are also available on live chat for any assistance you may need.
